channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Hiker Rescue; INC#1560; 08:15PM; Bronson Canyon; MAP: https://bit.ly/458yNRe; #GriffithPark; The two stranded hikers ( unknown age / gender / affiliation ) and their small pet dog have been safely hoisted aboard the hovering LAFD helicopter from very steep terrain near the Bronson Caves. Though initially stating they were uninjured in their ordeal, the hikers are now reporting minor injuries, and will both be transported directly via LAFD helicopter to an area hospital for further assessment, with their uninjured pet dog.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E27 E82 H4 HA4 H7 HA7 RA82 RA827 RH114 T27 UR27 UR88; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#1560; 07:48PM; Bronson Canyon; MAP: https://bit.ly/458yNRe; #GriffithPark; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to two persons and small pet dog stranded in very steep terrain near the Bronson Caves. Plan A = LAFD Helicopter hoist rescue of all three and transfer to safe location.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E82 H4 HA4 H7 HA7 RA82 RH114 T27 UR88; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1239; 04:55PM; 5812 N Tujunga Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/45bclXp; #NorthHollywood; 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 23 minutes to access, confine and extinguish an outside fire that extended into the attic of one story residential duplex. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E60 E86 E89 RA78 RA860 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1239; 04:32PM; 5812 N Tujunga Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/45bclXp; #NorthHollywood; PRELIM: Outside fire extended into attic of one story residential duplex.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E60 E86 E89 RA78 RA860 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0859; 01:38PM; 138 E Sycamore Park Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/455T7m1; Highland Park; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 27 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire extended into an exposed wall of the attached one exposed building but was prevented from extending to the 2nd. Firefighters continue to dig out any remaining hot spots in the wall and clear the attic while additional crews clean up some small spots of fire in the adjacent vegetation. No further details.; FS 44; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E1 E12 E212 E220 E44 RA12 T12 T20; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0859; 01:24PM; 138 E Sycamore Park Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/455T7m1; Highland Park; Two buildings exposed to the fire - one story (update it is attached to the fire unit) exposure with potential fire extension inside the wall. Firefighters are doing salvage work while opening the wall to chase down the fire. The two story exposure is being defended from any fire extension. There are no injuries reported.; FS 44; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E1 E12 E212 E220 E44 RA12 T12 T20; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0859; 01:01PM; 138 E Sycamore Park Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/455T7m1; Highland Park; Detached garage with heavy fire showing, exposing the primary residence. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 44; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E1 E12 E212 E44 RA12 T12; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0997; 03:56PM; 12245 N Louise Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sbdxvx; Granada Hills; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters extinguished the fire in 30 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters defended the exposed home (Delta -north- side) from the fire and prevented it from extending into the structure. The fire did extend to some vegetation and trees behind the row of trees but was quickly stopped from spreading into the canyon below. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 BC15 CE83 CM40 CM42 E18 E27 E275 E28 E287 E289 E290 E75 E87 E91 EA1 EM14 EM15 H1 H2 H7 HA1 HA2 HA7 HR3 RA18 RA889 RA90 T75 T87 T89 T90 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0997; 03:26PM; 12245 N Louise Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sbdxvx; Granada Hills; Two story, single family dwelling (under construction) well involved in fire with at least two additional buildings exposed. Firefighters are in the defensive mode against the well involved building while additional firefighters are working to defend the adjacent exposed building from fire extension. One additional task force requested.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E18 E287 E290 E75 E87 RA18 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#1545; 11:12PM; 1501 N Will Rogers State Park Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/2Vd4NVH; Pacific Palisades; After an exhaustive search by air and ground of all trails in the area, firefighters are unable to located the 3rd missing hiker. The adult male hiker has not be in contact with his family and this incident is now transitioning to a 'missing person' with LAPD in command (anticipating LA Co Sheriff Dept providing ground search personnel). Any questions regarding the ongoing search are referred to LAPD Inc# 4014. No further details.; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 BP23 E23 E269 E290 E69 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA69 RH114 T69 T90; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart
